
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/zhou185/p/18856100" title="发布于 2025-04-30 22:22">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Multisim14.0安装包免费获取，超详细中文安装步骤助你快速上手！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h3 id="multisim140简介">Multisim14.0简介</h3>
<p>Multisim14.0是由美国国家仪器公司（NI）推出的专业电子设计自动化]（EDA）工具，广泛应用于电路设计、仿真验证、教学实验及科研开发领域。其核心功能是通过虚拟仿真技术，帮助用户快速验证电路设计，降低硬件试错成本。</p>
<h3 id="1-下载">1. 下载：</h3>
<h3 id="通过网盘方式下载国内用户友好">通过网盘方式下载（国内用户友好）</h3>
<ul>
<li><strong>官方正版Multisim14.0下载：</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>🔗 <a href="https://pan.quark.cn/s/d39bb8d5f283" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">点击下载Multisim14.0安装包</a></p>
<p>📦 文件信息：<code>Multisim14.zip</code></p>
<p>🚨 注意：下载后需解压（不能正常解压可以使用360压缩）</p>
<h3 id="2-安装教程">2. 安装教程</h3>
<h4 id="21-安装multisim">2.1 安装Multisim</h4>
<p>单击选中 <code>Multisim14.0安装包</code>，右键选择 <code>解压到Multisim14.0</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428112320166.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428112320166" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>双击打开解压后 <code>Multisim14.0</code> 安装包文件夹：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428161433347.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428161433347" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>单击选中 <code>NI_Circuit_Design_Suite_14_0</code>，右键选择 <code>以管理员身份运行</code></p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428112720522.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428112720522" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>确定</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428112916605.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428112916605" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Browse</code>选择合适的路径，然后点击<code>Unzip</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428113032797.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428113032797" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Unzip</code>后请耐心等待安装：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428154404198.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428154404198" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>确定</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428113304385.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428113304385" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Install NI Circuit Design Suite 14.0</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428113513734.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428113513734" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><code>Full Name*用户名</code>和<code>Organization*公司名</code>后面的文本框任意填写，然后点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428113821019.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428113821019" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>否</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428155203283.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428155203283" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<blockquote>
<p>默认安装在C盘，如果C盘空间有限，点击【Browse】选择合适的安装路径，选择空间较大的盘即可。</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428155603521.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428155603521" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115010972.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115010972" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/QQ%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%8720250428155810.png!bky1" alt="QQ图片20250428155810" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>请耐心等待安装：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115201675.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115201675" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115250059.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115250059" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>选择<code>I accept the above 2 License Agreement(s)</code>，然后点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115352967.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115352967" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115621050.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115621050" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115714385.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115714385" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>请耐心等待安装：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428115816928.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428115816928" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Next</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428120351902.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428120351902" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>No</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428120455569.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428120455569" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>Restart Later</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428120636540.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428120636540" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="22-安装nilicense-activator">2.2 安装NILicense Activator</h4>
<p>回到最开始解压的<code>Multisim14.0</code>文件夹中，点击<code>NILicense Activator 1.2</code>，右击<code>选择以管理员身份运行</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428120910206.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428120910206" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>Base Edition</code>，然后点击<code>Activate</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428121800087.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428121800087" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>Full Edition</code>，然后点击<code>Activate</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428121927487.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428121927487" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>Power Pro Edition</code>，然后点击<code>Activate</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428122021421.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428122021421" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>Full Edition</code>，然后点击<code>Activate</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428122138826.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428122129118" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>Power Pro Edition</code>，然后点击<code>Activate</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428122221250.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428122221250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>把<code>Base Edition</code>、<code>Full Edition</code>和<code>Power Pro Edition</code>前面的复选框由白色变绿色（如下图），然后关闭该对话框：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428122425123.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428122425123" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="23-安装中文语言包">2.3 安装中文语言包</h4>
<p>回到最开始解压的<code>Multisim14.0</code>文件夹中，右键<code>Chinese-simplified</code>文件夹，然后选择<code>复制</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428122835999.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428122835999" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击左下角<code>开始</code>菜单，在搜索框搜索<code>NI Multisim 14.0</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428123016266.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428123016266" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键<code>NI Multisim 14.0</code>，打开文件所在位置：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428123159704.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428123159704" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>左键按住<code>NI Multisim 14.0</code>，拖至桌面：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428123512317.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428123501083" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键桌面上的<code>NI Multisim 14.0</code>，选择<code>打开文件所在的位置</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428123723534.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428123723534" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>上滑找到<code>stringfiles</code>文件夹，双击打开：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428123836102.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428123836102" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键空白处，选择<code>粘贴</code>。确保将<code>Chinese-simplified</code>文件夹粘贴到<code>stringfiles</code>文件夹中：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428124015286.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428124015286" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<code>继续</code>：</p>
<blockquote>
<p>没有这个弹窗的直接看下一步</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428124115341.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428124115341" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>双击打开桌面上的<code>NI Multisim 14.0</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428124233126.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428124233126" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 id="24-软件运行界面如下">2.4 软件运行界面如下</h4>
<p><img src="https://blog-image-1252200258.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/image-20250428124508862.png!bky1" alt="image-20250428124508862" loading="lazy"></p>

</div>
